title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of an HTTP error 404.
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the response is an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the expected behavior is to return an HTTP error 404 instead of HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
SR: To resolve this issue, the Tomcat 7 instance should return an HTTP error 404 when accessed with no webapps deployed.
